title: Unpopular opinion: Corrections are healthy
content:
For those who asked about earnings season:

Large-caps vs Mid-caps

Performance: Mid-caps up 0.5% vs Large-cap -0.75%
Valuation: Large-caps at 25 PE vs Mid-caps at 22 PE
Risk: Mid-caps more volatile short-term

Verdict: Mid-caps for risk-takers, Large-caps for stability

Time will tell.
